DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the efficacy of bio-oxidative ozone application in the treatment of TMD of muscular origin.
DOC.brief_title: Ozone Therapy for Masticatory Muscle Pain (OTMMP)
DOC.detailed_description: Ozone is a natural pale blue gas that can be found in the atmosphere. Medical grade ozone is a powerful oxidizing agent which can be produced commercially in ozone generators. Ozone can have effects on blood components and positively affect oxygen metabolism, cell energy, immunomodulation and microcirculation.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of myofascial pain according to the Research Diagnostic Criteria for Temporomandibular Disorder (RDC/TMD) Natural posterior occlusion. Any TMJ internal derangement Inflammatory connective tissue disease Psychiatric problem Tumour Hearth disease or pacemaker Pregnancy Other orofacial region disease symptoms (e.g. toothache, neuralgia, migraine) Treatment or medication use for headache or bruxism in the last 2 years Local skin infection over the masseter or temporal muscle
